scenes.imagePrompt: A bustling, rustic North Indian dhaba kitchen scene. A large copper pot of steaming chhole is visible. Warm, earthy tones. Traditional Indian illustration style, focusing on the aroma and steam.

Close-up of a halwai (cook) kneading white flour (maida) in a large brass parat. He is adding a spoonful of yogurt (dahi) or fermented starter to the dough. Focused lighting on the hands and the mixing process. Nostalgic illustration style.

A dramatic shot of a large, deep kadhai filled with bubbling oil. The dough is just dropped in, starting to expand rapidly. The cook watches with surprise and delight. Traditional Indian art style, emphasizing the heat and transformation.

A perfectly puffed bhatura, golden brown, being lifted out of the oil with a slotted spoon. It is placed next to a bowl of spicy chhole on a traditional steel thali. Warm, inviting colors. Cinematic, traditional illustration.
